text: The Tower Magazine is a monthly conservative, pro-Israel magazine devoted to long-form journalism about the Middle East. The Tower is owned by The Israel Project, which is known as "Israel’s most effective nongovernmental public relations agency." The Tower Magazine was established in 2013. Founding editor-in-chief David Hazony served until leaving in 2017. Mark Dubowitz, the CEO of a pro-Israel think tank Foundation for Defense of Democracies, describes The Israel Project’s publications, which The Tower Magazine is one of, as "unique and credible." ==References== ==External links== * * 16 March 2015 Radio interview with editor about The Tower Magazine Category:2013 establishments in Washington, D.C. title: The Tower Magazine
